#labels Actions,Incomplete-Example
==Summary==
`SynchronizedTrace` is a subclass of [SynchronizedFunction] that runs a `trace()` statement after a delay (offset). 

==Syntax==
{{{
new SynchronizedTrace(message:*, offset:* = 0)
}}}
  * `message` - The message to display in the output window.
  * `offset` - The delay before the message is displayed.

[http://mimswright.com/kitchensync/docs/api/com/mimswright/sync/SynchronizedTrace.html API Reference for SynchronizedTrace]
